safetyTips: Items are being delivered on a next-day service by DHL who are following all necessary precautions to protect their drivers and customers.
name: Tomlinsons
description: Tomlinsons has been at the heart of Dulwich Village since 1992.  Its homewares and unusual decorative pieces are mostly sourced from France and Scandinavia. Tomlinsons also has a wide range of gifts, jewellery, women's fashion, candles, diffusers and hand-care products. Tomlinsons stock a wide range of Annie Sloan Chalk Paints and accessories to help reinvent any tired looking furniture around the house. Much stock is on our website but please do call if there is anything not there that you require.
